completeness.description: Extent to which the solution covers all steps needed to address the question.

accepted_values.partial: Some but not all relevant steps covered

accuracy.description: Degree of correctness of the final answer provided.

efficiency.description: How economically the agents have used resources (time, computational power) to solve the question.

collaboration.description: Effectiveness of the interaction between the agents in the multi-agent system.

adaptability.description: Ability of the system to handle unexpected challenges or variations in the task.

traceability.description: The ability to track and understand the decision-making process of the agents.

reliability.description: Consistency and dependability of the solution over multiple trials or variations of the task.

compliance_with_specifications.description: The degree to which the solution meets the specified requirements of the task.
